title: Rehabbed 2 BR in Prime Lincoln Square Location
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   PROPERTY INFO ID: 265721996Rent: $2,295 / MonthBeds: 2Bath: 1Available Date: 08/01/2022Pet: Pet FriendlyRent Includes:: WaterParking:: no parking This 2 BR in a prime Lincoln Square Location is a must-see!  - Brand New Everything! - Brand New Kitchen - Granite Counter Tops - Stainless Steel Appliances, Dishwasher, Built-in microwave - New Bathroom - Gorgeous Dark Hardwood Floors - Tall ceilings and Great natural light - Large living room - Large Bedrooms with lots of closet space - New HVAC with AC - PETS WELCOME FEATURESA/CCats OkDogs OkHardwood FloorsLaundry in UnitModern BathroomModern KitchenNew AppliancesStainless Steel Appliances  Greg Firak Leasing Agent 224-404-0319    The Apartment Source Call or text: 773.404.9900
